issue.description: NG_001728.3/AF500654.1 missing from assembly
issue.resolution_text: AF500654 and AY318212 have their best placements to the same location on build 37 reference and Celera assemblies. AF500654 and AY318212 are mined from two different versions of the Celera assembly. Based on BLAST of Celera trace, AF500654 has best matches to 7 traces from strain A/J and DBA/2J, whereas NG_003367.1 has best matches to 3 traces from strain 129X1/SVJ. No single strain (A/J, DBA/2J, 129X1/SVJ, or C57BL/6) supports two separate loci, so these all appear to be allelic. Consequently, GeneIDs 257840 and 404459 have been merged, and the NG_ was updated based on the reference sequence.

issue.description: AK133972.1 from C57BL/6 does not align to the mouse reference assembly over its 3' half (nt 1286..end), but does have an almost complete alignment to Celera (missing the last exon). AK133972.1 has an aberrant structure (retained intron and skips an exon), but the alignments to the mouse Celera, rat reference, and human reference assemblies indicates that AK133972.1:3515..end should correspond to five exons that appear to be missing in AL772253.12.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Unrecorded TPF update between assembly components BX649461.4 and CT030013.7
issue.description: A TPF update between BX649461.4 and CT030013.7 has occurred for unknown reasons.
issue.resolution_text: AL845427 is a deleted clone and has been removed from the TPF. CT030013 (a component of the mouse assembly) contains the deleted sequence.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL691489.20
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL691489.20
issue.resolution_text: Assembly of AL691489.20 was found to have a sequencing error . Component has been resubmitted to to correct the discrepancy.

issue.summary: Potential over-collapsed repeat within a single clone
issue.description: Potential over-collapse of sequence with AL837506.3. Aligning traces derived from C57BL/6J sequences shows this region with >425X trace coverage.
issue.resolution_text: Having investigated AL837506 I'm happy the clone is assembled correctly based on restriction digest data and read pair information

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone BX649359.3
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone BX649359.3
issue.resolution_text: PCR performed and an error found in the reference component BX649359.3. The PCR has been submitted to EMBL/GenBank accession FO082288, this has been added to the TPF to correct the reference.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL831736.15
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AL831736.15
issue.resolution_text: Assembly of AL831736.15 was found to have a sequencing error. Component has been resubmitted to correct the discrepancy.
